Package ohos.agp.components

Class DragInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.DragInfo

  • public class DragInfo
extends Object
    Stores the data of identified dragging gestures.

    This class stores data specific to a dragging gesture that has been identified, and returns the data with the callback function.

    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      Point downPoint
      Indicates the coordinate of the position where the finger touches the screen.
      Point startPoint
      Indicates the coordinate of the position where the finger starts dragging.
      Point updatePoint
      Indicates the coordinate of the update position when the finger is dragging.
      double xOffset
      Indicates the horizontal offset.
      double xVelocity
      Indicates the velocity of horizontal dragging, in unit of pixels per second.
      double yOffset
      Indicates the vertical offset.
      double yVelocity
      Indicates the velocity of vertical dragging, in unit of pixels per second.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DragInfo​(Point downPoint, Point startPoint, Point updatePoint, double xOffset, double yOffset, double xVelocity, double yVelocity)
      Creates information of a dragging gesture.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • downPoint

        public final Point downPoint
        Indicates the coordinate of the position where the finger touches the screen.

      • startPoint

        public final Point startPoint
        Indicates the coordinate of the position where the finger starts dragging.

        Once the dragging gesture is identified, where the finger presses against is regarded as the startPoint.

      • updatePoint

        public final Point updatePoint
        Indicates the coordinate of the update position when the finger is dragging. Once the drag event is triggered, the current position of the finger during dragging is regarded as the update position.

      • xOffset

        public final double xOffset
        Indicates the horizontal offset.

        The horizontal offset is obtained compared with the previous horizontal dragging.

      • xVelocity

        public final double xVelocity
        Indicates the velocity of horizontal dragging, in unit of pixels per second.

      • yOffset

        public final double yOffset
        Indicates the vertical offset.

        The vertical offset is obtained compared with the previous vertical dragging.

      • yVelocity

        public final double yVelocity
        Indicates the velocity of vertical dragging, in unit of pixels per second.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DragInfo

        public DragInfo​(Point downPoint,
                Point startPoint,
                Point updatePoint,
                double xOffset,
                double yOffset,
                double xVelocity,
                double yVelocity)
        Creates information of a dragging gesture.
        Parameters:
        downPoint - Indicates the coordinate of the position where the finger touches the screen.
        startPoint - Indicates the coordinate of the position where the finger starts dragging.
        updatePoint - Indicates the coordinate of the update position when the finger is dragging.
        xOffset - Indicates the horizontal offset, in unit of pixels.
        yOffset - Indicates the vertical offset, in unit of pixels.
        xVelocity - Indicates the horizontal velocity, in unit of pixels per second.
        yVelocity - Indicates the vertical velocity, in unit of pixels per second.
